article_title: Liberal Think Tank Makes Amazing Discovery

article_metadata.description: In 2012, a liberal think tank called the Tax Policy Center published a report purporting to show that Mitt Romney’s plan for tax reform would raise taxes on the middle class. Though other tax experts debunked TPC’s claims, the Obama campaign gleefully deployed them to help win reelection. Well, TPC is back, this time with a 50-page report aimed at the Republican candidate who Democrats most fear: Marco Rubio.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
